acceptMessage: Please accept the match in the next 3 minutes or you will be abandoned
signUp:
Welcome to Pavlov Match Making!
This is a Shack Only Server where we recommend people have atleast 100 hours in SnD before queuing up.
The rules for the server are documented here https://shackmm.com/rules
If you have any questions please contact a moderator via a ticket. Providing you agree to the rules please press the button below to continue.
info:
# Format:
- The format of a game will be a best of one Search and Destroy match.
- Team A will first ban 3 maps by clicking the corresponding button.
- Team B will then ban 2 maps by clicking the corresponding button.
- Team A will then choose the map by clicking the corresponding button.
- Team B will then choose which side they wish to start by clicking the corresponding button.
- In the event of a tie in voting an option will be chosen randomly out of the most voted options.
- You can change your vote by clicking the button again

# Start of Match:
- Each player will have 3 minutes to accept the game by clicking on the check mark
- After every player has accepted the ban/pick phase will begin
- Once the match channel is generated players have 5 minutes to get into the server once it is setup

# During the Match:
- Everyone is required to use oculus party for comms
- Everyone is expected to abide by the rules: https://shackmm.com/rules

# End of Match:
- A player from each team will submit the score using the correct button on the embed
- There will be a 10 second window to change the scores submitted

# Ranks: 
(lower limit - upper limit)
- Master 1950 - N/A
- Diamond 1821 - 1949
- Platinum 1701 - 1820
- Gold 1611 - 1700
- Silver 1551 - 1610
- Bronze 1470 - 1550
- Iron 1375 - 1469
- Copper 1300 - 1374
- Wood N/A - 1299

# Map Pool
- Mirage
- Dust 2
- Cache
- Oilrig
- Inferno
- Overpass
- Harbor
- Industry
region: Select a region according to the region split in the rules
